# Core Banking â€“ Regulatory Constraints

## Mandatory Constraints
- All monetary operations must be auditable.
- All customer-impacting changes must be traceable to an explicit action.
- Ledger state must be reconstructable at any historical point in time.

## Regulatory Expectations
- Deterministic execution
- Explicit error handling
- Complete transaction lineage

## Forbidden
- Non-deterministic posting logic
- Unlogged financial state changes
